outputs.output_descr: The program will  update the land categories  databases into the Land Information Manangement System (LIMS) and develop a methodology for the national land audit as well review related policies on security of tenure land administration valuation and compensation. The results of the project  informs  the  Consolidated Land and Agriculture Reform Program.

project_descr: Programm to develop a methodology and plan for the national land audit in Zimbabwe
